200301.n: Modeling and Analysis of Large Systems

200501.n: Modeling and Analysis of Large Systems

200802.n: Modeling and Analysis of Large Systems

200902.n: Modeling and Analysis of Large Systems

201201.n: Modeling and Analysis of Large Systems

catList: Modeling and analysis of large systems by bringing together a multitude of operations research techniques. Students will be exposed to unstructured problems particular in the areas of telecommunications and energy systems and will operate in teams to understand the problem, to transform it into a model, to bring a solution to the model using appropriate solution techniques, translate the model solution to problem solution.
